title: fanoutqa: What companies have ever had a market capitalization in excess of 1 trillion US dollars and approximately how many employees did each of those companies have in recent years? (5aa09932011c8fcd)

chat_history.content: What companies have ever had a market capitalization in excess of 1 trillion US dollars and approximately how many employees did each of those companies have in recent years?

1. Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL): Apple surpassed the 1 trillion dollar market cap mark in August 2018 and was the first company to reach this milestone. As of 2023, Apple continues to be valued above 1 trillion dollars. In 2022, Apple had approximately 154,000 full-time employees.

2. Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ: MSFT): Microsoft reached a market cap of over 1 trillion in April 2019. As of 2023, it remains above this value. In 2022, Microsoft had approximately 181,000 full-time employees.

3. Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ: AMZN): Amazon's market capitalization exceeded 1 trillion in September 2018. It currently stands above this figure. In 2022, Amazon had over 1.5 million full-time employees.

4. Alphabet Inc (NASDAQ: GOOG): Alphabet, the parent company of Google, joined the club in January 2020. It currently maintains a market cap above 1 trillion. As of 2022, Alphabet had around 156,000 full-time employees.

5. Saudi Aramco (TADAWUL: 2222): The Saudi Arabian oil and gas company briefly held the title of the world's most valuable company when it debuted on the Saudi stock market in December 2019. At its peak, it surpassed 2 trillion US dollars. As of 2023, it is valued just below the 2 trillion mark. According to its 2021 annual report, Saudi Aramco had 76,300 employees.

6. Meta Platforms (NASDAQ: META): Formerly known as Facebook Inc, the social media giant first crossed the 1 trillion mark in June 2021. However, it has since fallen below this value. Meta had around 87,000 full-time employees in 2022.

These companies represent some of the largest and most influential enterprises globally, and their market capitalizations can fluctuate based on various economic factors and market conditions. The employee counts provided are the latest available figures and may have changed since then.

functions.name: search
functions.desc: Search Wikipedia for an article with the given title, and get its content. If no such article is found, return similar article names.
